mapper.select: select tb.*,u.username,u.headimgurl,u.mobile,td.activity_name from tb_order tb left join sys_user u on u.user_id=tb.user_id left join tb_activity td on tb.activity_id = td.id where tb.activity_id = #{activityId} order by tb.create_time desc

select tb.*,u.username,u.headimgurl,u.mobile,td.activity_name from tb_order tb left join sys_user u on u.user_id=tb.user_id left join tb_activity td on tb.activity_id = td.id where tb.group_id = #{groupId}
select t.*,u.headimgurl from tb_order t left join sys_user u on u.user_id=t.user_id where t.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.activity_id=#{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.*,u.headimgurl from tb_order t left join sys_user u on u.user_id=t.from_user where t.from_user = #{from_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.activity_id=#{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.*,u.headimgurl,u.username,ta.* from tb_order t left join sys_user u on u.user_id=t.user_id left join tb_activity ta on ta.id = t.activity_id where u.mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.order_type=#{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
